macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indices Mixed on First Trading Day of 2026 Amid Weekly Losses
items.summary: The Dow Jones rose 0.66% to 48,382.39, S&P 500 gained 0.19% to 6,858.47, Nasdaq dipped 0.03% to 23,235.63, and Russell 2000 advanced 1.06% to 2,508.22. Markets aim to rebound after last week's declines, with Asian and European indices also higher.

items.title: Geopolitical Tensions Rise with US Capture of Venezuelan President Maduro
items.summary: US forces captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, impacting global crude supply concerns and causing West Texas Intermediate oil prices to dip. Traders monitor updates amid potential effects on Venezuela's energy sector and market openings.

items.title: US Strikes Against Venezuela Spark Market Volatility Concerns
items.summary: News of US strikes on Venezuela over the weekend could lead to a lively trading start, with investors watching geopolitical developments alongside a light economic data calendar early in the week.

items.title: Intel Shares Surge 6.7% on Chip Stock Rally
items.summary: Intel (INTC) jumped 6.7% as chip stocks rallied on the first business day of 2026.

items.title: Boeing Shares Rise 4.9% on Positive Reports
items.summary: Boeing (BA) shares increased 4.9% following reports boosting investor sentiment.

items.title: Key Economic Data Ahead Including ISM PMI and Non-Farm Payrolls
items.summary: Upcoming releases feature ISM Manufacturing PMI today, Eurozone CPI and US ADP jobs Wednesday, and critical US Non-Farm Payrolls on Friday, with limited data early in the week.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Crypto Market Surges 1% to $3.24 Trillion with Bitcoin Above $92,000
items.summary: The cryptocurrency market capitalization increased by 1% to $3.24 trillion, with 87 of the top 100 coins gaining value over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin surpassed $92,000 (up 1.2%), Ethereum rose 0.5% to $3,155, and XRP led gains at 2.9% to $2.13.

items.title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on $100,000 Rally in 2026
items.summary: Bitcoin traders are showing strong optimism for 2026, with increased interest in $100,000 call options on Deribit, signaling bullish sentiment as the year begins.

items.title: PwC Deepens Crypto Involvement After Years of Caution
items.summary: Major accounting firm PwC is expanding its cryptocurrency operations, marking a significant shift from its previously cautious stance toward digital assets.

items.title: Institutional Inflows Continue with Grayscale and BlackRock Leading
items.summary: Grayscale recorded $103.72 million in inflows while BlackRock took in $47.16 million, with five of nine major crypto funds posting inflows and none recording outflows.

items.title: Whale Activity: $2.4 Billion Deposited to Binance
items.summary: On-chain data shows crypto whales deposited approximately $2.4 billion to Binance, split nearly evenly between Bitcoin and Ethereum.

items.title: U.S. Demand Rebounds as Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index Climbs
items.summary: The Coinbase Bitcoin Premium Index has surged sharply in the first week of 2026, indicating a rebound in U.S. investor demand for Bitcoin.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: DuneCrawl Launches Today on PC
items.summary: DuneCrawl, an online co-op action-adventure game, releases on January 5, 2026, for PC, marking one of the first notable video game launches of the week.

items.title: Over 25 Mobile Games Scheduled for January 2026 Releases
items.summary: January 2026 features a packed mobile gaming calendar with more than 25 titles across genres like ARPGs, tactical sims, and TCGs, including major multi-platform releases like Arknights: Endfield on January 22 and The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin on January 28.

items.title: Indie Gaming Highlights for January 5-11: Death Machine, Dungeon Antiqua 2, and FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS
items.summary: This week's indie releases include Death Machine, Dungeon Antiqua 2, FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS (1.0 launch by solo developer), Havenhold, Shadows of Soldiers, and Past Fate, spanning co-op, MMOs, RPGs, and popular genres.

items.title: Top Five Games Releasing in January 2026 Announced
items.summary: The gaming industry kicks off 2026 strongly with standout titles highlighted as the top five releases for the month, promising exciting new content.

items.title: Dice Tower Reviews Board Games Including Dice Throne Outcast in Weekly Roundup
items.summary: The Dice Tower's January 5, 2026, week in review covers recent board game releases like Dice Throne Outcast with four new spooky characters and a reworked Spirits of the Wild edition, scoring high for variability and appeal.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
